channel.title: Overloads

item.title: Overloads
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[code=java]public void ovlEffect() {
    EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
        public void execute(EventContainer b) {
		if(c.playerLevel[3] < 50) {
		c.sendMessage("You need 50+ HP To drink overload potions.");
		return;
	   } else 
            if (ovlTimer > 0) {
                //c.sendMessage("" + ovlTimer);
                c.startAnimation(3170);
                c.dealDamage(10);
                c.handleHitMask(10);
                ovlTimer -= 1;
                c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
            }
            if (ovlTimer == 0) {
                b.stop();
            }
        }
    }, 1250);
}[/code]

This is mine.

Read full topic

item.title: Overloads
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

Ok I decided to add overloads, being successful so far. Only getting one problem…Well I have this code in potions class…

if(c.playerLevel[3] <= 50){ c.sendMessage("You need above 50 hitpoints to drink this"); return;
15335 - 15338 is my code for overloads(4) - (1). if a player drinks them they get his 5 times with a 10. So I figure I need the above code so they won’t kill their self. The problem is, if the player is under 50 health they can still drink the potion. Can anyone help?
